text: Amadou Ba (born 17 May 1961) is a Senegalese politician who served as Prime Minister of Senegal from 17 September 2022 to 6 March 2024. He unsuccessfully ran for President of Senegal in 2024. He also was the Foreign Minister of Senegal from 2019 to 2020. He was Minister of Finance and Economy from 2013â€“2019. Ba was listed as one of the Top 100 most influential Africans by New African magazine in 2011, 2012 and 2013. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Senegal Category:People from Dakar
title: Amadou Ba
